Class GlobalPoolingLayer

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler, ApiWrapper<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.GlobalPoolingLayer>
    public class GlobalPoolingLayer
extends Layer<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.GlobalPoolingLayer>
    A version of DeepLearning4j's GlobalPooling that implements WEKA option handling.
